description: Updates on our activities to make London's transport network greener

texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["Download reports on what we have done to make London's transport network greener."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
Current Health, Safety and Environment reports are available on the Health, safety & environment page .
We have tested the emissions performance of Euro 6/VI vehicles in urban environments.
This report presents the results from these tests, alongside a summary of the legislative and technical framework for Euro 6/VI vehicle emissions standards.

{"template":"listgroup","style":"nocard","links":[{"title":"Auxiliary temperature reduction units in the greater London area","url":"/cdn/static/cms/documents/auxiliary-temperature-reduction-units-in-the-greater-london-area.pdf","icon":"download","size":"PDF 868KB","image":{}},{"title":"London Exhaust Emissions Study - developing a test programme","url":"/cdn/static/cms/documents/london-exhaust-emissions-study-developing-a-test-programme.pdf","icon":"download","size":"PDF 1.21MB","image":{}},{"title":"London Exhaust Emissions Study - drive cycle development","url":"/cdn/static/cms/documents/london-exhaust-emissions-study-drive-cycle-development.pdf","icon":"download","size":"PDF 1.20MB","image":{}},{"title":"Euro 6/VI emissions testing","url":"/cdn/static/cms/documents/in-service-emissions-performance-of-euro-6vi-vehicles.pdf","icon":"download","size":"PDF 655KB","image":{}}],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
The movement of trains over the rails, engineering works and customer use all contribute dust to the Underground network. Find out how we manage the dust levels on the Tube.

{"template":"listgroup","style":"nocard","links":[{"title":"Respirable airborne dust monitoring at London Underground stations and train lines 2017","url":"/cdn/static/cms/documents/respirable-airborne-dust-monitoring-at-various-london-underground-stations-and-train-lines-2017.pdf","icon":"download","size":"PDF 3.93MB","image":{}},{"title":"Air quality on the Tube 2016","url":"/cdn/static/cms/documents/air-quality-on-underground.pdf","icon":"download","size":"PDF 113KB","image":{}},{"title":"Dust monitoring 2016","url":"/cdn/static/cms/documents/dust-monitoring-london-underground-network.pdf","icon":"download","size":"PDF 3.89MB","image":{}}],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}

As part of our drive to be as environmentally friendly as possible, it's not possible to print a copy of our 2007, 2008, 2009 and 2010 environment reports. If you still need a hard copy, email publishing@tfl.gov.uk .

In 2011/12, we carried out analysis to understand the potential impacts of the Olympic and Paralympic Route Networks on air quality in London.
